page.title: 12Housing,Hobbies in Eastoft
page.content: Housing--There are mainly detached properties including farm houses.There is a small council block with about 36 blocks of semi-detached houses,8 bungalows and 6 flats.The last were built in 1975. Recreation--Very little recreation in the village,people have to travel out.Eastoft is on a bus route,but there is small demand for the service as most people use cars.About 4 buses leave daily except on Sundays,a school bus travels to the Secondary School and another takes students to the Colleges at Scunthorpe.The opening of the M.18 motorway has reduced the flow of traffic between Goole and Eastoft. Religions--In the villages there are a few Methodists but the rest of the approx.350 inhabitants are equally split between Roman Catholics and Church of England.
